entry.text:
[B6A67B]For the period of subscription you will get:[-]
- Triple in-game shop point income. [i](3 skycoins for every 5 minutes on server)[/i] - Special stand out shade of green name color in-game. - Special Discord role and access to the supporter only channels. - Ability to set second home location [i](/sethome2 and /home2)[/i]. - Ability to set third home location [i](/sethome3 and /home3)[/i]. - Access to a [i]/bag[/i] chat command that will take you back to your death location. - Access to [i]/donor[/i] Safe Zone with 5 traders and 2 workbenches - You are allowed to have 21 land claims (24x24 blocks) placed per map. - Permanent player buffs
[B6A67B]Player Buffs - [-][39ff14]Tier 4[-]
- 10% XP Gain increase - 5% Walk/Run speed increase - 10% Stamina regen increase - 10% Noise reduction - 20% Faster looting - 5% loot bonus
